TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {56239=Bont is the first footwear manufacturer to commercially use materials such as fiberglass, Kevlar and Carbon. They are continually driving development, along with their reputation for producing the highest quality products. After continual requests in 2007 the decision was made to produce line of shoes into the cycling market. Working together with world class athletes, Bont launched its initial offering of cycling shoes and in its inaugural year at the 2008 Beijing Olympics finished with 8 Gold medals. Bont Cycling has rapidly grown, since this point, it’s product line to over 12 models in stock sizing and now caters extensively to all disciplines of cycling. Bont’s range of cycling shoes cater not only to high performance athletes, but also to enthusiasts and beginners alike.}
